716601f-a.text:
120-130 Baxter Street, west side, at, adjoining, and south of the S.W. corner of Hester Street. The view also shows 200-202 Hester Street, at and adjoining the S.W. corner of Baxter Street.
About 1925.
716601f-a.folder: Baxter Street & Hester Street, Manhattan, NY

716602f-a.text:
143 Baxter Street, east side between Hester and Grand Streets, showing P.S. 130.
Board of Education, N.Y.C.
Credit Line Imperative.  July 22, 1929.
716602f-a.folder: Baxter Street & Hester Street, Manhattan, NY

716600f-a.text:
Baxter Street, from Hester Street, north to Grand Street. The building in the background with the dome is Police Headquarters.
September 20, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
716600f-a.folder: Baxter Street & Hester Street, Manhattan, NY
